body.name: Portable Clip on fan, Cordless Small Fan, Rechargeable Personal Fan, 10000mAh Battery Operated Desk Fan, Small Table Fan with Clamp, 3 Speeds Quiet Mini Fan for Office Bedroom Camping Stroller
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 33 mins
features: 🍃[10000 mAh Portable Clip Fan]: GEHEN personal portable fan. This portable fan is able to use the fan's battery to charge up a phone or tablet in a pinch. Rated use time: 12-40 hours; wind speed: 7-11 mile/h(based on wind speed). strong Clamp design is compatible with all scenes, such as office, home, kitchen, stroller, camping, fishing and so on. (Note: Comes with a 3.94 ft charge cable)

🍃[Comes with a Soft Pad in Clip]: The clip holds strongly and does not fall off. The clip can be fixed to a maximum diameter of 3.0 inches.(7.5 cm) What's more, the bottom of the clip has a non-slip grip. Clamp-on for non-restrictive space on tabletop & clip & hang Can be used in a variety of locations, including in the car, at home, in the office. When used with an air conditioner, it can reduce the temperature setting and conserve power.

🍃[360° Angle Adjustable & 3 Speed Modes]: You can manually adjust it to 360° left and right, and it will deliver cool air in any direction. The wind strength can be switched between 3 stages, weak, medium wind, and strong wind. You can freely adjust the airflow according to your preference. By frequently switching between air flow modes, it reduces wasteful power consumption. In weak mode, the operating sound is quieter than the cooler, so you can use it at work or in the library.

🍃[Ultra Quiet & Safety]: Portable and Ultra Quiet, Equipped with a silent mode that is less than 20 dB so you can sleep soundly all night. Made of superior ABS resin, the safety design of the protector cover makes it impossible to insert even small fingers. Avoid accidents and injuries.

🍃[[12-40 Working Hours]]: Portable fan x 1, Multi-lingual instruction manual x 1. If you have any problems with our products, please feel free to contact us. The shop is responsible for exchanging and returning. We care about our customers' shopping experience and thoughts, in order to provide you with satisfactory products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m glad I bought this
reviews.reviewText: I bought 3 of them when it was on sale,1 for my car,1 for my dinner tray and 1 for a spare,it blows good and built solid

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Another great GEHEN fan!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased the GEHEN Portable Clip on Fan, and I am so impressed by how powerful and versatile they are! The fan is e rechargeable, battery-operated, and have a 10000mAh battery capacity, which provides ample power for extended use. This is my second purchase of a GEHEN fan, the previous one was a clip on USB powered Desk Fan that I love, so I had no reservations about buying another fan from this company.The fan is also incredibly quiet, which is perfect for use in an office or bedroom. The sturdy clamp allows me to easily attach the fan to my desk, bed, or even my camping tent or chair. Plus, the 360-degree rotation feature allows me to direct the cool air exactly where I need it.This fan will be a lifesaver during the hot summer months, keeping me cool and comfortable no matter where I am.I would highly recommend this fan to anyone looking for a powerful, quiet, and versatile personal fan. It'sa 5-star product that has exceeded my expectations in every way, and looking forward to keeping me cool!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fan, great customer service
reviews.reviewText: I have 3 of these fans for rv. Holds charge long time, quiet, adjusts position easily, good breeze. One fan stopped charging- seller responded immediately and sent a replacement right away. Fans are a little particular about the type of AC usb adapter you use - the small older style 1" cubical adapters seem to always work, some newer ones don't.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Was looking for a small rechargeable fan for the gym. This one is perfect! Clamp is large enough to clip onto treadmill or bike. Has multiple levels and has good battery life. Provides plenty of air flow/wind to keep you cool. I love it!!The fan screen did keep popping off, but fir the price a couple drops of crazy glue solved that problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this for my forklift at work, I love I can hang it on my lift and it sits perfectly on the lift as well. There’s no noise, no vibrations, light an easy to use, an it’s 3 levels of cool, I love this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The battery empties even if you don’t use ir between the charges i get the use of about 10 minutes and if you plug it in ubc to charge it won’t work until it is fully charge very weird so you can’t use it and leave it plugged init’s not worth the $15 i paid

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great fan but defective
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The fan blows good on level 1-4 but level 5 as shown in video doesn't seem to work properly. I got this fan as an alternative to using my big fan at night as well as for work. Tonight its really warm so I decided to crank it to the max only for it to behave in this manner. It holds a charge well but u must use the correct charging box to charge this fan. So no android charger will work on this device. Other than that defect, it's really good but I wish I could 🔋 power it to the max.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wind speed/volume so you will know before ordering if it will work for you.
reviews.reviewText: Quiet operation, Quality construction and ease to put it into operation immediately.
